SELECT U_VCCG.*, T_OVTG.Rate AS 'VatRate', T_OVTG.Type, (U_VCCG.Currency + '+' + U_VCCG.VatGroup + '+' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(T_OVTG.Rate AS FLOAT))))) AS 'Value', (U_VCCG.Currency + N'（' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(T_OVTG.Rate AS FLOAT)))) + N'%）') AS 'Label' FROM U_VCCG LEFT JOIN T_OVTG ON T_OVTG.Code = U_VCCG.VatGroup
